commands.name: help
commands.short: Lists commands and their descriptions.
commands.extra: If an argument is given, `{}help` will look up in-depth description of the argument.

commands.name: embeds
commands.short: Sends an embed with the message of your choice.

commands.name: quote
commands.short: Sends an embed with someone's message, with their avatar and username.

commands.name: clean
commands.short: Deletes your messages up to a limit.

commands.name: info
commands.short: Gives you information about the bot

commands.name: update
commands.short: "Updates" your version of embedbot. Technically it deletes the bots files and redownloads them from the github. Oops.

commands.name: cls
commands.short: Clears your console's screen.

commands.name: support
commands.short: Makes you join the support server.

commands.name: kill
commands.short: Kill is kind of harsh because it kil- shuts off the bot.

commands.name: restart
commands.short: Restarts the bot.

commands.name: print
commands.short: Prints a message to the console.

commands.name: test
commands.short: Tells you if the bot is active or not.

commands.name: game
commands.short: Changes your playing status.
commands.extra: Note: It won't show up for your client, but it _will_ show up for others.

commands.name: nick
commands.short: Changes your nickname.

commands.name: status
commands.short: Changes your status.
commands.extra: Statuses are: online, idle, dnd and offline.

commands.name: blur
commands.short: Blurs an image of your choice.
commands.extra: You can upload an image with the command as a caption, or you can pass a link as an argument.

commands.name: undertext
commands.short: Generates an Undertale textbox with the message of your choice.

commands.name: invert
commands.short: Inverts an image. Please don't rely on it, as it doesn't always work.
commands.extra: You can upload an image with the command as a caption, or you can pass a link as an argument.

commands.name: f
commands.short: Pays respects.

commands.name: eval
commands.short: Evaluates a command of your choice.
commands.extra: Advanced mode command, as it has the possibility to destroy your computer, or at least send some of your information. Please use carefully.

commands.name: memberundertale
commands.short: Sends the amount of users with Undertale related usernames or nicknames in the current server.

commands.name: getinvite
commands.short: Creates an invite from your current server, or a server you can specify.

commands.name: changelog
commands.short: Shows the changelog for the current version.

commands.name: **beemovie***
commands.short: O-oh, don't use this... It sends the whole bee movie script... It should only be used by Alexia. Or should I say, bee used.
